Pecinta Satwa Polisikan Kasus 6 Anjing Disiram Air Panas di Jakpus
05 Nov 2019, 09:18 by Tim detikcom
Jakarta - Yayasan Natha Satwa Nusantara melaporkan pelaku penyiraman enam ekor anjing di Kramat, Senen, Jakarta Pusat, ke polisi. 4 Anjing yang disiram air panas kini meninggal.
"Ya, jadi hari ini kita ada pelaporan terkait anjing yang diduga dianiaya oleh kakak ipar pemilik dari anjing ini sendiri," kata Direktur Operasional Natha Satwa Nusantara Annisa Ratnakurnia saat ditemui di Polres Metro Jakarta Pusat usai melakukan pelaporan sebagaimana dikutip dari Antara, Selasa (5/11/2019).
Laporan terhadap penganiayaan enam ekor anjing itu teregistrasi dengan nomor 2034/K/XI/2019/RESTRO JAKPUS. Meski sudah terlapor namun Anissa belum melakukan Berita Acara Pemeriksaan (BAP) dengan pihak kepolisian.
"Nanti dipanggil lagi untuk pemeriksaan, minggu depan kali ya," kata Anissa.
Anissa mengharapkan kasus penyiraman yang menjadikan enam ekor anjing sebagai korban cepat diselesaikan dan dapat menjadi pelajaran bagi pelakunya.
"Meski pemilik anjing bilang pelakunya sudah menyesal, tapi aturan hukum yang benar harus tetap berjalan. Sekarang bisa saja korbannya anjing tapi bisa pelakunya melakukan hal yang sama dengan korban yang lain," kata Anissa.
Diketahui melalui unggahan yang viral dari akun instagram @nathasatwanusantara pada Minggu (3/11) yayasan itu mendapatkan laporan mengenai lima ekor anjing yang tersiram air panas dan pemiliknya meminta pertolongan biaya untuk dibawa ke klinik hewan.
Saat relawan Natha Satwa Nusantara mengecek kondisi kelima ekor anjing itu terlihat ada enam ekor anjing yaitu dengan rincian lima ekor anak anjing dan satu ekor induk anjing yang sudah dalam keadaan lemas akibat penyiraman itu.
Keenam ekor anjing itu terlihat memiliki luka bakar di sekujur tubuhnya dan berdasarkan pemeriksaan Dokter Hewan Cucu ditemukan lidah seluruh anak anjing itu mengalami pecah- pecah.
Berselang satu hari, empat anak anjing ditemukan sudah tidak bernyawa karena badannya terlalu lemah meski sudah mendapatkan penanganan medis.
"Saat ini masih bertahan itu, anak anjingnya satu bersama induknya. Keadaannya masih muntah-muntah dan muntahannya berbau amis artinya ada pendarahan akibat penyiraman itu, " kata Anissa.

Animal Lovers Police Case 6 Hot Watered Dogs in Central Jakarta
05 Nov 2019, 09:18 by Tim detikcom
Jakarta - The Natha Satwa Nusantara Foundation reported the perpetrators of watering six dogs in Kramat, Senen, Central Jakarta, to the police. 4 Dogs that have been scalded by water now die.
"Yes, so today we have a report related to a dog that was allegedly mistreated by the brother-in-law of the owner of this dog himself," Natha Satwa Nusantara's Director of Operations Annisa Ratnakurnia said when met at Central Jakarta Metro Police after reporting, as quoted by Antara, Tuesday (5) / 11/2019).
The report on the persecution of the six dogs was registered with number 2034 / K / XI / 2019 / RESTRO JAKPUS. Even though it has been reported, Anissa has not yet conducted the Minutes of Examination (BAP) with the police.
"You will be called again for inspection, next week," said Anissa.
Anissa hoped that the watering case that made six dogs as victims was quickly resolved and could be a lesson for the culprit.
"Even though the dog owner said the culprit was sorry, but the correct legal rules must continue. Now the victim could have been a dog but the culprit could do the same thing with the other victims," Anissa said.
It was discovered that through a viral upload from the Instagram account @nathasatwanusantara on Sunday (3/11) the foundation received a report on five dogs that were scalded and the owner asked for help with costs to be taken to the animal clinic.
When the volunteer Natha Satwa Nusantara checked the condition of the five dogs, six dogs were seen, with details of five puppies and one dog that had been weakened by watering.
The six dogs were seen to have burns all over his body and based on the examination of the Grandchild Veterinarian it was found that the tongue of the entire puppy had cracked.
One day later, four puppies were found dead because their bodies were too weak despite receiving medical treatment.
"At present it still survives, the puppy is one with its mother. The situation is still vomiting and vomit smells fishy meaning there is bleeding from the watering," said Anissa.
